attributes.action: stop infant schools making pupils do homework
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My 4 year old son who goes to school 2 and a half hours a day is sent home with 2 pieces of homework a week.
I know this doesn't seem much but it is a slippery slope.
The average child now spends between 3-4 hours a night doing homework. Take into account how long a school day is they are now putting in more hours that your average full-time worker.
I believe that children are being factory fed information from an earlier and earlier age - this must stop.
PLEASE LET CHILDREN BE CHILDREN - YOU ARE AN ADULT A VERY LONG TIME!
